titleStmt.title: The Round-heads remembrancer: or, a true and particular relation of the great defeat given to the rebels by His Majesties good subjects of the county of Cornwall, under the command of Sr Ralph Hopton, on Tuesday May 16. 1643.

notesStmt.note: "A short but apparently accurate account of the fight at Stratton"--Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
